text:
It works only half of the time. It seems that some buffer doesn't get cleared between page refreshes and I get "ghost" logs from previous logging, or it doesn't work at all.
Also, the infamous "Headers too big" error, where it doesn't even try show at least part of the messages.
Looking for a new extension, or enough time to write my own.
Stay away from it
Liked, however it does not show the logs from POST requests which respond with redirect header (location: URL), so it misses logs.

It would be very handy to add autoexpand to a plugin configuration (or in plugin switch).

It's very annoying to keep clicking and clicking to expand, such as the contents of an array

This is extension has been unmaintained for years and has serious issues. Overall, this has done more harm than good for our team - we've tried to address several issues (we've sent several pull-requests to fix and enhance it) but the developer is completely unresponsive on all channels. Suggest you stay away - or be prepared for a lot of failure and frustration.

Have no clue how to get the report.  Looks like others have the same issue, but no one replies to them.
You'd get a lot more users if you could explain how to get to the report.
Awesome!!
Not working as of version 65.0.3325.181 (Compilação oficial) (64 bits) (cohort: Stable).

- Debugging of PHP objects seems not to work in this version ("Error in event handler for runtime.onMessage: TypeError: Cannot read property 'match' of null")

- Grouping seems not to work

Both of these things worked previously.
I have no clue how to use it what so ever... any help?

Works perfectly! Would recommend it to any dev!
Perfect, thank you, very helpful to get messages in one console for php and client side JS.
Great extension with simple setup techniques.

Great extension, and now I don't have to var_dump behind blocks of visual elements, etc.

Works great for a WordPress Dev by including in wp-config.php and logging throughout the project.

Great work, no bugs, works great!
Excellent tool. Locks up on occasions but simple page refresh solves it. Love it!
easy setup and work properly.
Superb extension. So much easier than having to use XDebug for PHP
very helpful and easy. Thanks.
Nothing happen when I use this extension coulnd't even think how to get this working.
fantastic!
Really a useful and easy to use extension.
Good extension, it's very useful.

Fantastic extension, simple and easy to install and use.

Thank you so much.

This is super great. I have a minor gripe. The plugin needs to be switched on for each domain you want to use it with, which is fine, but it sometimes switches off again. It would be great if the options allowed you to set a list of domains where it would be on by default. 
Yes, I'm holding the 5th star hostage until this gets added.

This is a useful extension, but there is a problem with some Ngnix and apache server due big header data sent by ChromePhp json, you can skip this issue by only using when really need it, with no abuse.
does not work.
insane cozy stuff
Excellent extension!
loved it
Easy to use, great time saver
Great tool

Great idea and I'm sure if I had another 2 hours to mess with it, I could figure out why headers aren't being emitted despite including the PHP files every way conceivable, but it doesn't and I don't have time to debug a debugging tool.
nice and simple to use
I love this extension.  Just some more learning and this will be very very useful to me.
make sure to check out the site so you can download the php class. it actually works!!
I use it every day in my professional development. It's an indispensable tool that makes my job so much easier to do. Thanks so much for a fantastic extension!
Great :)

Is there a way to expand items automatically? I'm printing out SQL queries and trying to display a number of parameters, like time it took to run, the number of returned rows, the query itself, etc. As there's no way to print text as a table, I was trying to print objects, but can't find a way to expand the records automatically.

Other than that, it is really nice and easy to use, thanks for your work!
Fantastic. Makes it very easy to see what is going on with my PHP code.
Just installed and works great! Thank you very much!!!
